Ok, it's crazy that this place is inside a Mobil mini mart, but it is.  It'd some of the best Dominican food around! The oxtail was amazing, the tumeric tea was so different and delicious,  and I so appreciated the coffee! We live in Milford PA, but are looking for excuses to go back!

Absolutely GREAT FOOD! If you don't want to cook that night you can always get your families' meal here! They also serve breakfast too!! I recommend the Chicken Empanadas for a quick bite!!! 10 out of 10 They won't disappoint!!

Excellent Dominican food.  This place is tucked away inside the Mobile Mart.  The rice and meats were excellent.  The beans delicious.  Tostones were great.   House fresh flavored waters were delicious.    The only draw back is that the dining area is shared with the mini Mart for traffic.  You can always get it to go.
Very affordable great tasting authentic food. Everything is made fresh daily. Love it

Eating in Rosa's kitchen is like eating at home. The food is delicious and the seasoning is very well balanced. I can't wait to return.

A Hidden Gem of Authentic Dominican Delights!

Rating: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê (5/5)

I stumbled upon this hidden gem, a hole-in-the-wall Dominican spot, and let me tell you, it's an absolute culinary delight! Located in Middletown, this restaurant offers some of the best Caribbean food I've had in the area.

The highlight of my experience was the warm and welcoming atmosphere created by the two lovely ladies who run the place. They were incredibly sweet and attentive, making my visit all the more enjoyable.

Upon my request, they graciously prepared the empanadas fresh, and they were nothing short of perfection. The burst of flavors in each bite transported me to the streets of Santo Domingo. And if you're in the mood for some classic Dominican dishes, the arroz con gandules and pork chops are a must-try!

The authenticity of the flavors here took me back to the heart of the Dominican Republic, reminding me of my grandma's cooking. It's rare to find such a genuine taste so far from home, and I'm grateful for stumbling upon this little treasure.

For anyone seeking an unforgettable experience of good Dominican food, I can't recommend this spot enough. Trust me, you won't be disappointed. Don't miss out on this culinary adventure!
I love, love the food there real fresh home made food very recommended!

Best Sandwich had after a long time. Didn't expect to be that good becuase it is located inside a Gas Station (Mobil). Service is excellent and they made everything fresh. Fresh Lemonade was really good. Definetly go back if I'm visiting Middiletown.
Delicious authentic food and great service. The staff were very courteous, polite and friendly.
Great Dominican food!
Great food, friendly service. A must have.
The chef and his staff were so warm and friendly.  Food was outstanding!
